TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataRowView extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor, class System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo, class System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject, class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged

type DataRowView = class interface ICustomTypeDescriptor interface IEditableObject interface IDataErrorInfo interface INotifyPropertyChanged

summary.span: 表示 的自定义视图。

span.span: Represents a customized view of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只要显示数据 (例如控件中的数据), 就只能显示每行的一个版本。Whenever data is displayed, such as in a control, only one version of each row can be displayed. 显示的行是。The displayed row is a . `Original` `Default` `Proposed` `Current`可以有四种不同版本状态之一:、、和。 A can have one of four different version states: `Default`, `Original`, `Current`, and `Proposed`. 对进行调用后, `Proposed`任何已编辑的值都将成为值。After invoking on a , any edited value becomes the `Proposed` value. 在调用 或之前`Original` ,`Proposed`该行具有和版本。 Until either or is invoked, the row has an `Original` and a `Proposed` version. 如果调用了, 则将放弃建议的版本, 并且值将恢复`Original`为。If is invoked, the proposed version is discarded, and the value reverts to `Original`. 如果调用了 , 则不再具有`Proposed`版本; 而建议的值将变为当前值。If is invoked, the no longer has a `Proposed` version; instead, the proposed value becomes the current value. 默认值仅适用于具有定义了默认值的列的行。Default values are available only on rows that have columns with default values defined. ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性确定中某行的状态。The following example uses the property to determine the state of a row in the . (有关使用的其他示例, 请参见。)(See for another example using .) [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataRowView.RowVersion1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataRowView.RowVersion1/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataRowView.RowVersion1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataRowView.RowVersion1/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: This type is safe for multithreaded read operations.

threadsafe.span: 必须同步任何写入操作。

span.span: You must synchronize any write operations.

summary.span: 开始编辑过程。

span.span: Begins an edit procedure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 可添加。Use to add a . 方法与的 方法完全相同。 The method is identical to the method of the . 调用后, 对所做的任何更改都可以通过调用回滚。After calling , any changes made to the can be rolled back by calling . 在允许用户更改行值之前调用方法。Call the method before allowing users to change row values. 更改值后, 可通过将设置为来`DataRowVersion.Proposed`检索新的值。After values have been changed, you retrieve the new values by setting the to `DataRowVersion.Proposed`. 使用业务规则检查值, 并根据需要通过调用来回滚更改, 或调用以接受更改。Check the values with a business rule, and roll back the changes if needed by calling , or call to accept the changes. ## Examples 下面的示例在中编辑行。The following example edits a row in a . 在之前调用, 然后调用。 calling the before, and afterwards. summary.span: 取消编辑过程。

span.span: Cancels an edit procedure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用后, 对该行进行的所有更改都将回滚。After calling , all changes to the row are rolled back. 还可以通过对父级 调用来回滚更改。You can also roll back changes by calling on the parent . ## Examples 下面的示例在中编辑行。The following example edits a row in a . 如果验证失败, 则调用方法以取消更改。The method is called to cancel the changes if the validation fails. span.span: Deletes a row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在对行所属的调用之前 , 不会永久删除行。 The row is not permanently deleted until is invoked on the that the row belongs to. > [!NOTE] > 当从基础表中删除时 `DataRow` , 可能无效。A may be invalid when a `DataRow` is deleted from the underlying table. 当变为无效时, 访问与关联的值 (如) 的操作将引发异常。 When the becomes invalid, operations that access values associated with , such as , throw an exception. ## Examples 下面的示例对行使用方法。The following example uses the method on a row.
